summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2846, for the improvement of the alley in block 59, A. A. Denny's Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue and 7th Avenue, from Pike Street to Pine Street, all in the City of Seattle, by planking under Ordinance No. 34413 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
